name: HearthstoneTest
description: Unit tests for Hearthstone-related functionalities in the VideoGameFaker.

test_cases.name: battlegroundsScoreTest
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a Battlegrounds score within a specified range.

test_cases.name: standardRankTest
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a standard rank with a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: wildRankTest
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a wild rank with a specific pattern.
